events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to request a refund immediately.
The system categorized this issue under Refund based on the customer's refund request.
Agent Mary has been assigned to handle this refund request case.
Hello! I'm Mary and I will assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received?
My order number is 123456, and I have attached a photo showing that the item is incorrect.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3 business days.
That sounds good to me, thank you for the quick response and help!
Your refund has been processed successfully and you should see the amount credited soon.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if you need any further assistance.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you!
